p: For the three-class classification problems, the levels of virulence were categorized into low virulence if the MLD50 was > 10 6.0, intermediate virulence if the MLD50 was ≤10 6.0 and > 10 3.0, and high virulent otherwise. When the class of an infection could not be determined from the lower or upper bound of MLD50, then the following rules were used:
